dashboard_description: The Biolector Dashboard is a Streamlit application designed for analyzing and visualizing fermentation data from the Biolector XT.
biolector_file_desc: Excel file exported from Biolector XT containing all fermentation data
no_biolector_recipe_found: No Biolector recipe found. Please click on 'Create new recipe' to create one.
import_files_info: Import the Biolector XT Excel file to start the analysis
click_create_recipe: Click on the 'Create new recipe' button above to get started.
